Texts.Chs: 为何我会建议从^orange;激光挖掘器^reset;着手？因为它确实是挖掘土块的高效工具！
Texts.Eng: Might I recommend starting with a ^orange;Mining Laser?^reset; They are truly effective tools to use for rapidly digging through dirt!

Texts.Chs: 如果没有^orange;改造台^reset;，你将很难^green;扩充，升级和特化工具^reset;.。如果有机会，你应当试着建造一个。
Texts.Eng: Without a ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; you'll be hard-pressed to create ^green;augments, upgrades and specialist tools^reset;. When you get a chance, try building one.
